short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly set reminders to revisit specific web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Have you ever opened a website and said to yourself "I'd like to look at this more, but maybe later"?  This extension makes it simple to remind yourself to revisit any website when you decide.

Reminders are shown as native Chrome notifications, and when clicked you will be taken back to the site.  You can also snooze reminders for 15 minutes.

âœ… Note that browser notifications must be enabled for you to receive them.
long.de,es,fr:
Have you ever opened a website and said to yourself "I'd like to look at this more, but maybe later"?  This extension makes it simple to remind yourself to revisit any website when you decide.

Reminders are shown as unobtrusive native Chrome notifications, and when clicked you will be taken back to the site.  You can also snooze reminders for 15 minutes.
